titles.title: He’s The Glory and The Lifter Of My Head

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s the glory and the lifter of my head He’s the glory and the lifter of my head For You, Oh Lord, are a shield for me You’re the glory and the lifter of my head.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I cried unto the Lord with my voice I cried unto the Lord with my voice I cried unto the Lord with my voice And He heard me from His holy hill.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re the glory and the lifter of my head You’re the glory and the lifter of my head For You, Oh Lord, are a shield for me You’re the glory and the lifter of my head.{/lang-eng}
